about.title: About Me
about.bio: My name is Avtandili Makhatadze. With over 8 years of experience in front-end development and UI/UX design, I have a passion for crafting intuitive and performant digital products. I specialize in the React ecosystem, turning complex problems into elegant solutions. When I'm not coding, I enjoy drone photography and exploring new technologies.

step.desc1: We start by understanding your vision, goals, and target audience to create a solid strategic foundation.
step.desc2: Crafting intuitive, beautiful, and user-centric designs that bring your ideas to life visually.
step.desc3: Building a robust, scalable, and pixel-perfect product using modern technologies.
step.desc4: Deploying the final product and continuously monitoring for improvements and optimizations.
